videos.title: Wyomings roughest Gravel Race [Fistful of Dirt]
videos.description:
Fistful of Dirt is a 104 mile Gravel Race in Cody, WY
Was prepared for a fun and wild day out there, and that's exactly what I got racing "The Ugly" Course.

videos.title: 2019 Dead Swede with the Strider Bikes Crew
videos.description:
Myself and a few of my fellow coworkers from Strider Bikes headed to Sheridan, WY for the Dead Swede Hundo gravel bike race. We had an absolute blast at this awesome event. The weather was perfect and the scenery and fun was even better.

My hope is that you can see the fun we had in pushing each other to be our best selves.

videos.title: ONE OF WYOMING'S MOST EPIC BIKE RACES
videos.description:
Wyoming's premiere bike race, The Dead Swede 100/60/40/20, is quickly approaching! Race along the rolling foothills of Sheridan County and pedal your way up the 13,000' Bighorn Mountains. Not a cyclist? Don't worry. The Dead Swede has more to offer than just one of the most epic race courses in North America. Join the festivities of live music, dancing, and a whole lot of partying in historic Sheridan, Wyoming June 5th-6th! 

---

To register for the Dead Swede, visit thedeadswede.com.

---

  #VisitSheridan #VisitWyoming #ThatsWY Wyoming Office of Tourism

videos.title: Why the new Red Grade Trails are an awesome addition to our beautiful Bighorns backyard
videos.description: John Kirlin and Jordan LeDuc of The Dead Swede gravel bike race talk about why the new trails being built between Poverty Flats and Bear Gulch are a great addition to our community. The Dead Swede recently made a $5,000 donation that will be used to continue the build at Red Grade Trails.
